name: The Cleaner (itch) (mattefong, JimmyGodEngine, kairusL)
description:
Undercover, unarmed, yet unmatched. Underground drug rings have been plaguing the city for years creating chaos and injustice in the city and it’s up to one man to take down the cartels. The only option is to succeed - or die trying

Controls:
WASD - Move
E - Open Door
F - Pickup weapons/Drop Weapons
Right Click - Shoot/Melee

Credits:
Minjang Jin (JimmyGodEngine) - Programmer
Ka Meng Lei (Kairus) - Programmer
Matthew Fong - Game Designer
